programme.title: Rounders (1998)
programme.desc: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school

programme.title: The Mighty Ducks (1992)
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez coaches a lousy youth hockey team to the finals of a non-relevent hockey league. His old coach stands in his way.

programme.title: Days of Thunder (1990)
programme.desc: A man and his dream to race a car around a circle... 5 HUNDRED TIMES!

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: Jets in the sky... pewww peewwwww

programme.title: Three Kings (1999)
programme.desc: Planes in the sky... pewww peewwwww

programme.title: The Little Hours (2017)
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation

programme.title: The Spectacular Now (2013)
programme.desc: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

programme.title: The Drop (2014)
programme.desc: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deep into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living - no matter the cost

programme.title: The Little Hours (2017)
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk (2008)
programme.desc: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper

programme.title: The Ides of March (2011)
programme.desc: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail

programme.title: The Disaster Artist (2017)
programme.desc: When Greg Sestero, an aspiring film actor, meets the weird and mysterious Tommy Wiseau in an acting class, they form a unique friendship and travel to Hollywood to make their dreams come true

programme.title: Honey Boy (2019)
programme.desc: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early

programme.title: First Man (2018)
programme.desc: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969

programme.title: Moon (2009)
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems

programme.desc: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world

programme.title: The Number 23 (2007) 6.4/10
programme.desc: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise

programme.title: The Way, Way Back (2013) 7.4/10
programme.desc: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park

programme.title: The Kings of Summer (2013) 7.1/10
programme.desc: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land

programme.title: It's a Disaster (2012) 6.4/10
programme.desc: Four couples meet for Sunday brunch only to discover they are stuck in a house together as the world may be about to end

programme.title: The Number 23 (2007) 6.4/10
programme.desc: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise

programme.title: Heaven Knows What (2014)
programme.desc: A young woman struggles to reconcile her loves of her life: her boyfriend and heroin. She finds out that suicide is the only way for her boyfriend to forgive her for her misdeed

programme.title: Whiplash (2014)
programme.desc: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood (2019)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel

programme.title: Spirited Away (2001)
programme.desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts

programme.title: Heaven Knows What (2014)
programme.desc: A young woman struggles to reconcile her loves of her life: her boyfriend and heroin. She finds out that suicide is the only way for her boyfriend to forgive her for her misdeed

programme.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
programme.desc: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world

programme.title: The Zero Theorem (2013)
programme.desc: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves

programme.title: The Cloverfield Paradox (2018)
programme.desc: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality

programme.title: Midnight Special (2016)
programme.desc: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure (1989)
programme.desc: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey (1991)
programme.desc: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music (2020)
programme.desc: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, 2 would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny

programme.title: Timecop (1994)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future

programme.title: The Boondock Saints (1999)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico (2003)
programme.desc: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general

programme.title: The Fast & Furious Marathon
programme.desc: "Dude, I almost had you" "You almost had me? You never had me, you never had your car"

programme.title: UFC 253
programme.desc: UFC 253: Adesanya vs. Costa is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on September 27, 2020 at the Flash Forum on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada (2006)
programme.desc: Can this nerd turned hot secretary handle requests from devil who wears Prada?

programme.title: EuroTrip (2004)
programme.desc: Scotty's life is ruined and Matt Damon's makes a hit song about it named "Scotty Doesn't Know". He travels to Europe in search of German "muschi"

programme.title: Cool Runnings (1993)
programme.desc: Every movement has a beginning. Some say the BLM movement began when 4 black men slid down an ice track

programme.title: Knocked Up (2007)
programme.desc: Ben gives Alison a creampie, then spends 9 months convincing Alison (a bitch) why he wasn't her worst mistake

programme.title: This Is 40 (2012)
programme.desc: Pete is trying to save his marriage and business but his piece of shit moocher of a dad keeps asking for money

programme.title: Thor (2011)
programme.desc: Thor: Only a tough guy when he has a hammer. Loki, Thor's brother, loathes him because all the chicks flock him. Who wins? Good looking hammer boy or ugly brother?

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada (2006)
programme.desc: Can this nerd turned hot secretary handle requests from devil who wears Prada?

programme.title: The House by the Cemetery (1981)
programme.desc: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement

programme.title: Re-Animator (1985)
programme.desc: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue

programme.title: Alien - Director's Cut(1979)
programme.desc: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun

programme.title: Labyrinth (1986)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth

programme.title: The House by the Cemetery (1981)
programme.desc: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement

programme.title: 1BR (2019)
programme.desc: Sarah tries to start anew in LA, but her neighbours are not what they seem

programme.title: The Dead Don't Die (2019)
programme.desc: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

programme.title: The Snowman (2017)
programme.desc: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman

programme.title: Daniel Isn't Real (2019)
programme.desc: A troubled college freshman, Luke, suffers a violent family trauma. He then resurrects his charismatic childhood imaginary friend Daniel to help him cope, not realizing how dangerous Daniel is
